p: Propionibacterium acnes ATCC 6919 and Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 28319 were kindly provided by Dr. Mayri A. Diaz, Manchester University, UK. S. epidermidis was cultured aerobically on brain heart infusion (BHI) agar (LAB M limited, Lancashire, UK) and incubated at 37 째C for 18 h. We sub-cultured isolated colonies of S. epidermidis in BHI broth and incubated at 37 째C for 18 h aerobically. For P. acnes, we cultured the bacteria anaerobically on reinforced clostridial medium (RCM) agar (Oxoid Limited, Basingstoke, UK) for 48 h at 37 째C and ~5% CO 2 using anaerobic jar and anaerobic atmosphere generation bags (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA). We sub-cultured isolated colonies of P. acnes in RCM broth for 48 h at 37 째C under anaerobic conditions.
